item.title: Enhancing democratic processes through citizen involvement in policy development: a comparative analysis of the EU, Germany, and the United States
item.description: Susan Rose-Ackerman, a Henry R. Luce Professor of Law and Political Science, Emeritus, and Professorial Lecturer in Law at Yale University, and Lena Riemer, a Fox Fellow at Yale University and a Doctoral candidate at Freie Universit√§t Berlin, explore the evolving landscape of public participation in executive regulatory processes. While elections and referendums are fundamental to democratic participation, they possess inherent limitations in reflecting citizen preferences and addressing complex policy issues.
